meanings.sent1: She acted toploftical towards her classmates, thinking she was better than them.
meanings.sent2: The toploftical cat refused to play with the other pets in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The toploftical squirrel demanded only the finest nuts from the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her toploftical attitude towered over the rest of the group like a grand castle.
meanings.sent5: The toploftical queen looked down upon her subjects with disdain.

meanings.sent1: The toploftical tower reached towards the sky, trying to touch the clouds.
meanings.sent2: The toploftical price of the luxury car made it unaffordable for most people.
meanings.sent3: The toploftical cake was decorated with edible gold and diamonds.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were as toploftical as the highest mountain peaks.
meanings.sent5: The toploftical building sparkled in the sunlight, dazzling all who passed by.
